mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RAIN_consult_tbl ORDER by consultNo DESC
SELECT * FROM RAIN_consult_tbl c LEFT JOIN RAIN_consultHistory_tbl ch ON c.consultNo = ch.consultNo WHERE c.consultNo = #{consultNo}
SELECT eno,eName,job FROM RAIN_EMP_tbl where deptNo = 3
SELECT e.eno, e.eName, e.job FROM RAIN_EMP_tbl e WHERE e.deptNo = 3 AND (e.eName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR e.eno = #{keyword})
SELECT cs.consultNo,cs.csCompanyName FROM RAIN_consult_tbl cs WHERE cs.csStatus = '계약 완료' AND cs.csCompanyName NOT IN (SELECT comName FROM RAIN_cCompany_tbl)
SELECT cs.consultNo, cs.csCompanyName FROM RAIN_consult_tbl cs WHERE cs.csStatus = '계약 완료' AND cs.csCompanyName NOT IN (SELECT comName FROM RAIN_cCompany_tbl) and cs.csCompanyName=#{companyName}
SELECT csCompanyName, csName, csEmail FROM RAIN_consult_tbl WHERE csStatus = '계약 완료'
SELECT csCompanyName, csName, csEmail FROM RAIN_consult_tbl WHERE csStatus = '계약 완료' AND csName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{csName}, '%')
